title: Banned Account without motives?
body:
Hey all :)

So I was just wondering if there's anything you guys recommend I do/say to try get my old banned account back. So last year i let a friend play on that account and it received a 2 week ban for sharing accounts, i have no problem with this. I was in the wrong, i take full responsibility. Then out of nowhere about 4- 5 months later I wake up nice and early to start my ranked games only to find that account has been permanently banned. When i asked they simply stated i was scripting.

Now I have never used any scripts or any external programs but unfortunately Riot doesn't believe me. When i ask them to show me what i was doing they reply telling me they can't give that information since i can tell people not to use those scripts because they will be caught. Anyway, this is what brings me to my question, Riot employees wont listen/talk to me about this subject, they wont prove nor help me understand what was causing them to come to this conclusion.They refuse to help me whatsoever. What can i do to get that account back?

Thanks :)

replies.body:
If you have already been back and forth with support you are pretty much at the end of the line. You can try to submit another ticket if you want but it isn't likely to yield anything.

The smart money is on the person you let use your account used scripts while doing so.
TL;DR your friend tried to hack/exploit while using your account, because he is probably a 12-year-old and does not give a shit, due to it not being his account. true/false?
nah he didn't. He went on to play 1 game to see what it was like to play a few platinum elo games. He didn't use any hacks or exploits to my knowledge
